output.sentences: A man walks past a parade.
He sees a woman on a float dressed as a sea monster.
Next, a group of men holding huge rocket launchers marched past.
A few floats later, a woman dressed as a mermaid went by.
Last, he was greeted by a performer dressed as a transformer who went through the crowd
